text:
Contract Developers | London, UK

I'm looking for Python/Django contractors and a Microsoft Sharepoint specialist for projects scheduled to start in about 2 months. (If you're both Python developer and Sharepoint expert - super bonus). Great environment, cool projects. Ping me here or privately if interested or know someone who might be. This is on-site around Victoria area (London).

    Contact me at harel at harelmalka dot com
